link_text_color=”#ff6600″]

Companies that deal with inventory are always looking to simplify, streamline, and optimize their logistics, warehousing, and storage costs. Since inventories contain the bulk of a company’s assets, strategizing and proper inventory management can significantly increase efficiency. A Customs Brokerage is Your Cargo Concierge, and provides expert inventory management solutions for companies of all sizes.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://acb-us.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/AdobeStock_211127112-test-3.jpeg” title_text=”AdobeStock_211127112-test-3″ _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”23bf9273-8d95-45be-925d-5e17cead9746″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_5,3_5″ use_custom_gutter=”on” make_equal=”on” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” module_class=”ColumnReverse” _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” width=”1400px” max_width=”90%” custom_padding=”30px|60px|30px|60px|true|true” custom_padding_tablet=”20px|40px|20px|40px|true|true” custom_padding_phone=”|25px|20px|25px|false|true” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_vertical=”20px” box_shadow_blur=”20px” box_shadow_color=”#30303008″][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_image src=”https://acb-us.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/Screenshot-2020-12-22-at-3.19.11-PM.png” title_text=”Screenshot 2020-12-22 at 3.19.11 PM” _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”236fce37-e69a-4881-940d-c2feba202d54″][/et_pb_image][et_pb_image src=”https://acb-us.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/ruchindra-gunasekara-GK8x_XCcDZg-unsplash-scaled.jpg” title_text=”ruchindra-gunasekara-GK8x_XCcDZg-unsplash” _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”236fce37-e69a-4881-940d-c2feba202d54″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”default”][dsm_lottie lottie_url=”https://acb-us.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/box-squish.json” _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”39fe25d2-5a3f-4b79-b7f3-605380ed8141″ locked=”off”][/dsm_lottie][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”3acbf339-22b4-4c25-b6e9-e05753de7e09″]

How Inventory Management Works

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”df488d79-fa46-48ca-ace3-3d9ddb29bfc0″ link_font=”GothamBook||||||||” link_text_color=”#ff6600″]

Back when inventory management was done manually, it was a long and tedious task. Today, our software handles the bulk of the work for us and streamlines processes making inventory management more affordable, more efficient, and ultimately superior to its prior practices.

High performing Inventory management solutions, such as ours, consist of software that helps with planning inventory, forecasting, and, most importantly, inventory control. This intricate blend of features helps improve efficiency faster and is more cost-effective.

[/et_pb_text][dsm_lottie lottie_url=”https://acb-us.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/package-delivery-fill.json” module_class=”Lottie_image-inline” _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”_initial” width=”80px” width_tablet=”70px” width_phone=”60px” width_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” locked=”off”][/dsm_lottie][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”3acbf339-22b4-4c25-b6e9-e05753de7e09″ width=”80%” width_tablet=”” width_phone=”100%” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_margin=”23px||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”0px||||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet”]

How We Can Help

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”df488d79-fa46-48ca-ace3-3d9ddb29bfc0″ text_text_color=”#000000″ link_font=”GothamBook||||||||” link_text_color=”#ff6600″ header_3_font=”Poppins|600|||||||” header_3_text_color=”#000000″ header_3_font_size=”18px” header_3_line_height=”1.2em” header_3_font_size_tablet=”16px” header_3_font_size_phone=”15px” header_3_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

Refine forecasting and planning

Forecasting and planning account for some of the most time-consuming aspects of inventory management. By streamlining this aspect, we can give you a better perspective on forecasting, and improve planning by a considerable margin, thus significantly increasing efficiency.

Streamline management

Managing inventory is equally as important as forecasting, and improper management is usually the main driving force behind high inventory costs. Inventory management can be streamlined to achieve the lowest price, with maximum efficiency through software solutions and professional help.

Enhance analysis

Analyzing your current inventory, past inventory, and future inventory can provide priceless data. This data can then be used to establish and assess optimal inventory levels, price points, costs, and multiple other aspects to boost ROI significantly.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” make_equal=”on” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” width=”1400px” max_width=”90%” custom_padding=”30px|60px|60px|60px|false|true” custom_padding_tablet=”20px|40px|40px|40px|false|true” custom_padding_phone=”|25px|30px|25px|false|true” border_radii=”off|||25px|25px” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_vertical=”20px” box_shadow_blur=”20px” box_shadow_color=”#30303008″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”default”][dsm_lottie lottie_url=”https://acb-us.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/12/graph-line-growth-fill.json” module_class=”Lottie_image-inline” _builder_version=”4.8.1″ _module_preset=”_initial” width=”80px” width_tablet=”70px” width_phone=”60px” width_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” locked=”off”][/dsm_lottie][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”3acbf339-22b4-4c25-b6e9-e05753de7e09″ width=”80%” width_tablet=”” width_phone=”100%” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”0px||||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” locked=”off”]

Contact Us Today

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.1″ _module_preset=”df488d79-fa46-48ca-ace3-3d9ddb29bfc0″ link_font=”GothamBook||||||||” link_text_color=”#ff6600″]

Through proper inventory management, you can increase efficiency, speed up the process, and make a more prominent investment return. There are more than a few benefits to improving your inventory management game, and the best way to do so is to hire professionals that are up for the task.

We’re known for our flexibility and scalability, and we’re here for all of your inventory management, logistics, and warehousing needs.

excerpt.rendered: Acb’s Dedicated Client Support System Manages Your Entire Logistics. Your Only Responsibility Is To Advise Us Of Your Order. Our Technology Will Keep You Updated Through The Supply Chain With Detailed Reports Informing You Of The Status. As an NVOCC-licensed company with the Federal Maritime Commission, you can trust us with the compliance of your shipment. We provide you the latest technology and personal service to ensure that your cargo reaches its destinations in the most cost-effective manner.
